body_html:
chris-chris@a9ddcbd

I applied layer normalization to CoupledInputForgetGateLSTMCell.
But I'm not sure that this is the right application. So I need some reviews.
I didn't make a PR yet.

Please leave a comment if you have any feedback.

I'm now reading the references for layer normalization now...

[Reference]
https://arxiv.org/abs/1607.06450
"Layer Normalization"
Jimmy Lei Ba, Jamie Ryan Kiros, Geoffrey E. Hinton

body:
https://github.com/chris-chris/tensorflow/commit/a9ddcbddddb3d8a375c1e128d3c21b78e8bef2f6

I applied layer normalization to CoupledInputForgetGateLSTMCell. 
But I'm not sure that this is the right application. So I need some reviews.
I didn't make a PR yet.

Please leave a comment if you have any feedback.

I'm now reading the references for layer normalization now...

[Reference]
https://arxiv.org/abs/1607.06450
"Layer Normalization"
Jimmy Lei Ba, Jamie Ryan Kiros, Geoffrey E. Hinton
